CREDITS_PROMISE.message: 250,000 in cash. Right now. I would find that interesting.

DEFENSE_CRAFT_ELIMINATED.message: System defense craft eliminated. Incident has been logged.

HOSTILE_ACTION_REPORTED.message: Hostile action reported. Intercept and destroy!

PERFECT.message: Perfect. If anyone asks... Surely no one will ask, but if anyone asks, please remember that we were just haggling over a second hand shield generator.

RONDEL_RESTRICTED_ZONE.message: {playerShipLabel}, this star system is a restricted zone. You must leave within {seconds} seconds. Should you fail to comply, you will be assumed hostile and defensive precautions will be taken.

SOLFED_INTEL_INTRO.message: Keep your voice down, pilot. I'm an undercover agent working for Solar Federation Intelligence. Your ship's computer memory has some data we are interested in.

WEAPONS_EVASIVE_ACTION.message: Weapons discharge detected. Take evasive action!

WHAT_IS_THIS_ABOUT.message: What data? What is this all about?

YOU_VISITED_STAR_SYSTEM.message: You may or may not have visited some star system we would like to know more about.
